
snap(0,20,7)

sky(240,240,0)
fog(223,113,300)
ground(152,168,62)


name(Gamble| Scramble| Tangle)

fadefrom(3000)

nlaps(1)

set(10,0,0,0)p
set(10,0,5600,0)p
chk(40,0,5300,0)
set(26,0,6000,0)pr
set(23,0,6600,180)

set(23,-2500,11000,0)
set(40,-2500,13000,0)
set(10,-2500,13000,0)

set(23,0,30000,180)

set(23,2500,11000,0)
set(10,2500,13000,0)p

set(14,2500,17000,0)pt

set(10,11000,17000,90)

set(30,13000,17000,-90)p
